name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Node.js Engineer with 10+ years of experience in building high-performance software solutions, specializing in **Node.js**, **AWS**, and continuous integration/delivery. Proficient in developing responsive web applications using **React** and **TypeScript**, alongside expertise in NoSQL databases like **Amazon DynamoDB** and RDBMS such as **Amazon Aurora PostgreSQL**. Demonstrated ability to implement **AWS Lambda** functions for scalable services.
Extensive background in AWS cloud services, complemented by a robust understanding of automated CI/CD pipelines. Passionate about driving innovation and operational efficiency, leveraging **AI tools** to enhance application functionalities. Known for strong English communication skills and a commitment to delivering secure, maintainable solutions that adhere to compliance standards.

experience.responsibilities:
• Designed and implemented scalable, full-stack solutions using **Node.js**, **TypeScript**, and modern frontends in **React**, adhering to best practices in **responsive web apps** development.
• Developed and deployed cloud-based applications utilizing **AWS Lambda**, ensuring high-performance and cost-effective serverless solutions.
• Built applications with integration to **NoSQL** databases like **Amazon DynamoDB** and **RDBMS** options such as **Amazon Aurora PostgreSQL** for efficient data management.
• Implemented enterprise-level **continuous integration** and **continuous delivery** (CI/CD) pipelines using **Jest** for testing, driving rapid development cycles and high-quality code delivery.
• Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams, enhancing **English communication** skills to translate technical requirements into user-friendly applications.
• Delivered mobile applications with smooth user interfaces across platforms, leveraging modern frameworks and libraries to optimize performance and responsiveness.
• Led initiatives to improve application monitoring and error tracking leveraging cloud services to ensure top availability and seamless user experiences.
• Established robust testing frameworks using **Jest** and other tools to ensure quality across multiple layers of applications, enhancing overall reliability.
• Developed and integrated AI-driven functionalities into applications to improve user engagement and satisfaction, showcasing the use of advanced **AI tools**.
• Contributed actively to projects involving the migration of legacy systems to microservices architecture, significantly increasing application scalability and maintainability.

- Developed scalable and responsive web applications using **Node.js**, **React (18)**, and **TypeScript**, ensuring high performance and maintainability for financial services.
- Implemented **AWS Lambda** for serverless computing solutions, enhancing application responsiveness while reducing infrastructure costs by **30%**.
- Designed and managed databases with **Amazon DynamoDB** and **Amazon Aurora PostgreSQL**, optimizing data retrieval processes and ensuring high availability for critical financial datasets.
- Introduced continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) practices that increased deployment frequency by **40%**, improving overall release quality and speed.
- Onboarded users onto dynamic dashboards and admin portals, leveraging **Jest** for robust testing frameworks and ensuring quality in production releases.

- Deployed AI-powered solutions using advanced **AI tools** for fraud detection and transaction analysis, resulting in a **25%** improvement in anomaly detection efficacy.
- Focused on enhancing English communication skills to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams and stakeholders, ensuring clarity in requirements and project updates.

Implemented cloud solutions leveraging **AWS** services, including **AWS Lambda**, for serverless architecture improving deployment time by **50%** and reducing operational costs.
Designed and managed NoSQL databases like **Amazon DynamoDB** for dynamic data handling while utilizing **RDBMS** like **Amazon Aurora PostgreSQL** for structured data storage, ensuring data integrity and quick access to over **1 million** records.

Crafted responsive UI components utilizing **React**, ensuring a seamless experience across devices and browser compatibilities, leading to an uplift in user retention rates by **20%**.
